name: 优雅简约
description: 宋体衬线风格，优雅简约

styles.container: max-width: 720px; margin: 0 auto; padding: 12px 20px 30px 20px; font-family: "Songti SC", "SimSun", Georgia, serif; font-size: 17px; line-height: 2 !important; color: #333 !important; background-color: #fff !important; word-wrap: break-word;

h1.base: font-size: 28px; font-weight: 400; color: #1a1a1a !important; line-height: 1.5 !important; margin: 48px 0 24px; text-align: center; letter-spacing: 2px;

h2.base: font-size: 24px; font-weight: 400; color: #2c2c2c !important; line-height: 1.5 !important; margin: 40px 0 20px; text-align: center; letter-spacing: 1px;

h3.base: font-size: 20px; font-weight: 400; color: #3a3a3a !important; line-height: 1.6 !important; margin: 32px 0 16px; letter-spacing: 0.5px;

code.block: margin: 28px 0; padding: 20px; background-color: #f9f9f9 !important; border: 1px solid #e5e5e5; border-radius: 8px; overflow-x: auto; line-height: 1.8 !important;
code.inline: font-family: Menlo, Monaco, "Courier New", monospace; font-size: 14px; padding: 2px 6px; background-color: #f5f5f5 !important; color: #8b4513 !important; border-radius: 3px;

styles.quote: margin: 20px auto; padding: 10px 20px; background-color: transparent !important; border-left: 2px solid #ccc; color: #666 !important; max-width: 600px; line-height: 1.6 !important;
styles.image: max-width: 100%; max-height: 600px !important; height: auto; display: block; margin: 32px auto; border-radius: 8px;

table.header: background-color: #f8f8f8 !important; padding: 12px; text-align: left; border-bottom: 2px solid #d0d0d0; font-weight: 400; color: #555 !important;

styles.hr: margin: 48px auto; border: none; text-align: center; height: 1px; background-color: #e0e0e0 !important; max-width: 200px;
